example.title: KoolPivotTable Styles
example.metakeywords: php pivot table, php pivot grid, pivot table, pivot grid, php data analysis, php business tool, excel-like data summarization
example.description: KoolPivotTable is a simple yet powerful business ananysis tool. The strong point is the ability to let user create data view by their own with the combination of fields in row and column. KoolPivotTable is flexible in changing style. It also support the data filtering and sorting. Also the scrolling and paging features of pivot table gives users a convenient way to navigate through data.
